title: Is Miss Fortune's Ultimate Broken?
body:
Personally I feel it does way too much damage and is extremely useful in teamfights. If you are a squishy, one ultimate can 100-0 you if the enemy MF is fed.
It might not be OP, but since I usually play squishy assassins I feel it does a lot of damage.

replies.body: Riot just did a good job into making MF the wombo combo ADC, because if you are stuck in that ult, you are fucked.

Wombo combo? wheres the 'combo'? all i see is press R for win.

by definition a 'combo' requires more than 1 button to be pressed.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=GTlhlkYP,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-01-04T18:28:17.705+0000)
>
> Wombo combo? wheres the 'combo'? all i see is press R for win.
> 
> by definition a 'combo' requires more than 1 button to be pressed.

E then Ult. He may have also been referring to a team wombo combo rather than a single champ wombo...

If 2 abilities of a single champ class as a womb combo then i genuinely fear for the future of this game.

and its not really a team womb combo because unlike malphite/ori/yas/jarvan etc. it still is just as powerful on its own, so if you use it in conjunction with another ability like malphite's it doesn't increase its potential by much.

E.g. if you ult a whole team as malphite, and then ori ults as well then you do a little bit of damage to them, knock them all up, then do a lot of damage and knock them up again.

but if you ult them by yourself you deal a little bit of damage, knock them up and then get stomped 1v5

if you are MF and malphite ults and then you ult, they get a little bit of damage and get knocked up and then you do upwards of 4000 damage to them with no risk to yourself.

but if you do it by yourself, you STILL do upwards of 4000 damage with no risk to yourself.

so its not really a womb combo ability like malphite or yasuo's R is, its just another ability that deals damage, and like all damaging abilities it i probably slightly more effective when used in conjunction with other abilities.
Azir's soldiers do a lot of damage but if an elise stuns an enemy and enables you to get more auto's off on your soldiers, is that a womb combo? no it isn't, because you're just using normal abilities.

a wombo combo by definition as a 'combo' should be more effective as a collaborative effort, but MF's isn't, its just as powerful as it normally is.

Malphite's ult makes yasuo's better because it allows him to hit all 5 people with it and keep them airborne for longer.

Malphite's ult makes Ori's ult better because it doubles the airborne time as well as ensures she can hit all 5 people with it AND her W

Jarvan's Ult makes Fiddlesticks' more powerful because he cant chase all 5 people unless they are trapped inside J4's ult with him, and its not worth him ulting (and risking his own life) unless he can hit all 5 people (or at least a decent number) 


But none of that teamwork applies to MF, sure if they are knocked up during it they might be inside it for 3 seconds instead of 2.5 seconds, but overall that doesn't change the damage an awful lot. you're still doing 3500+ damage to them at no risk of your own.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=GTlhlkYP,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-05T05:08:08.656+0000)
>
> Stuff.

I love how serious you take everything? :D

Oh you're one of the people who stands in her ult of your own doing and complains that it's OP are you?

Fact is unless you're CC'd in the ult, leaving the ult isn't that hard, hence why she is the wombo combo ADC.

Lol get some experience.

i suppose you're one of those people who never has been hit by a skillshot because you can 'just dodge it'

if you're standing in the middle of the cone you still have heaps of damage dealt to you by the time you have left, don't try to be a smartass, also sometimes the situation means you cant leave, what if she ults in the confined space of the jungle etc.

also remember that almost every single champ in the game (even more with items) has some form of slow, and during/after a fight you are almost aways slowed by something, but if you're saying all you need to make a womb combo is add a slow then i guess every single ability in the game is a womb combo then.

your same logic applies to Kat, rumble, anivia, brand, gangplank, heimerdinger, morgana, rammus, swain, Zyra.

All those champs have similar ultimates, but you know what, they still do a lot of damage to you before you can completely get clear, also just as a fun fact Miss fortunes ult does more than all of them AND in a shorter time space.

also her 55+% win rate and 27+% pick rate supports my argument, if her ult was so easy peasy to walk out completely undamaged i doubt her win rate would be so high.

plus a 55% win rate is just begging for a nerf.

she is 11% more likely to win than Gragas and ryze and Urgot etc (most champs are 4/5% at max apart from eachother), that shows that something is off in her kit, and my nose tells me its her 4000 damage ultimate and her passive.

Even if MF isnt fed her ult is clearly super broken. The damage that can be delt in that amount of time at that range is so broken. Her ult damage isnt based on projectiles a person is hit by, it is an all or nothing ult. Super broken. Should of been completely altered a long time ago.
Shes broken in general i played against a kalista and whent like 0-8 then i meet her in jungle and one shot her with a auto and q
If you get hit with her e, that thing does a tonne of damage if you dont have a dash, but as long as you dont stay in it longer than .75 sec, it isnt much of a threat.
It can crit is the problem, get a decent amount of crit chance and it hurts. But it can be avoided quite easy.
Miss Fortune is average, thats why shes not picked in competitive play. She ults? Alistar headbutts, bye ult.
its just a good ult, its not broken at all.
Meh, I prefer it this way, rather than the way it was when people wouldn't even bother trying to get out of it because it hit like a wet noodle.
